BugInstance.message: Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.postgresql.visitor.statement.impl.PostgreSQLDDLStatementSQLVisitor.visitAlterTable(PostgreSQLStatementParser$AlterTableContext) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.postgresql.visitor.statement.impl.PostgreSQLDDLStatementSQLVisitor.visitCreateTable(PostgreSQLStatementParser$CreateTableContext) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.postgresql.visitor.statement.impl.PostgreSQLStatementSQLVisitor.findBinaryOperator(PostgreSQLStatementParser$AExprContext) excessively uses methods of another class

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.postgresql.visitor.statement.impl.PostgreSQLStatementSQLVisitor.createProjectionSegment(PostgreSQLStatementParser$TargetElContext, PostgreSQLStatementParser$AExprContext, ASTNode) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.postgresql.visitor.statement.impl.PostgreSQLStatementSQLVisitor.visitGroupByItem(PostgreSQLStatementParser$GroupByItemContext) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.postgresql.visitor.statement.impl.PostgreSQLStatementSQLVisitor.visitSortby(PostgreSQLStatementParser$SortbyContext) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.postgresql.visitor.statement.impl.PostgreSQLTCLStatementSQLVisitor.getLockTables(List): 1st parameter 'relationExprContexts' could be declared as java.lang.Iterable instead
